name: frenzy-plant
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Powerful, but leaves the
user immobile the next turn.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Powerful, but leaves the
user immobile the next turn.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
The foe is hit with
an enormous branch.
The user can’t move
on the next turn.

with an enormous
tree.

on the next turn.
